mixed-citation.article-title: Redescriptions of Neanthes Kinberg, 1865 (Annelida: Errantia: Nereididae) species from worldwide regions

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Neanthes vaalii Kinberg, 1865
, by subsequent designation of
Hartman (1954: 27)
.

The definition of the polyphyletic genus
Neanthes
introduced earlier by Bakken & Wilson (2005) through morphological phylogenetic analysis of
Nereidinae sensu Fitzhugh (1987)
and modified by Glasby (2015) and Villalobos-Guerrero & Idris (2021) is followed in the present study. For further details on the current taxonomic situation of the genus, see
Davenport et al. (2020)
and Villalobos- Guerrero & Idris (2021). The four species here morphologically delimited are still retained in
Neanthes
considering that genus definition.
